reference.title: cxxFunction module
reference.shortdesc: The cxxFunction module describes C++ functions, including member functions.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFunction> topic type contains elements to show the declaration, location, and usage of a function.

Common elements used to describe a function are:
cxxFunctionAccessSpecifier
cxxFunctionDeclaredType
cxxFunctionScopedName
cxxFunctionPrototype
cxxFunctionNameLookup
cxxFunctionAPIItemLocation
The cxxFunction topic contains the following elements:
